head.title: July 30-August 5; A New Kind of Publisher

hedline.hl1: July 30-August 5; A New Kind of Publisher

block.p: Staking out a place for itself in the world of electronic publishing, Random House, a unit of Bertelsmann AG, created a new imprint to publish exclusively digital books. The company said 20 new titles will be available beginning in January, either for downloading via the Internet or in single paperback copies printed as ordered by high-speed presses; none of the books will be distributed to bookstores.
